title: Office Worker’s Immortal Dungeon - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Depictions of Cruelty   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Monsters   R-15   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: Hirukuma   昼熊
description:
Waking up inside a strange cave, a simple office worker is immediately confronted to a big tiger-like creature, only to die shortly after.

That was however only the start of his torments.>
